Warehouse Non Moving Products stock/ Dead stock Report odoo Apps

This odoo apps will help to indentify Dead stock products, non moving products, slow moving product inventory which have quantity available has been remaining in warehouse for long time.

Looking for All sort of warehouse stock reports Odoo Apps, please check below module link
All in one Inventory Stocks Reports Odoo Apps.

Features

Details about stock.

Easily get details about how many products are unsold even it is available in stock between specific time period, user can select time period to generate report.

Get warehouse specific non moving products report.

Easily generate XLS file for stock valuation with summarized data.
Demo Request Video Tutorial

Non Moving Products Report Menu

Non Moving Products Report Wizard

When you click to the Menu you will get this wizard,in this wizard you have to select particular duration and warehouse for Generating Report of non moving products.
